metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35728 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.8 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related tocom.oracle.wls.shaded.org.apache.xalan.lib.sql.JNDIConnectionPool (akaembedded Xalan in org.glassfish.web/javax.servlet.jsp.jstl).

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
